mapper.insert: insert into baby_product(productName, brandId, releaseDate, company, cateCode, productPrice, productStock, productDiscount, productIntro, productContents) values(#{productName},#{brandId},#{releaseDate},#{company},#{cateCode},#{productPrice},#{productStock},#{productDiscount},#{productIntro},#{productContents})
mapper.select: select * from baby_pcate order by catecode
